name: Game Of Puzzles: Slavic Mythology
description:
Game Of Puzzles: Slavic Mythology - is a puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.
Assemble one big image from small images and you will be able to move to a new level as well as enjoy already assembled images in a special gallery.
Features:
  • Size range from 9 to 25 pieces
  • Suitable for children from 3 years old
  • Simple mouse control
  • Traditional logical gameplay
  • Steam Achievements
Credits: The game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
